page.title: 10HOME LIFE Essex/Cambs Border
page.content: General awareness of quality of diet was shown - particularly mentioned was the increasing importance of wholefood "high fibre" diets and freshness of food. Most households grow their own fruit and vegetables - a few eat home produced game, chickens and sheep. None entirely self-sufficient. Majority of population eat in restaur- ants at least once a month _ 10% never eat out _ some do once a week. "Take- away" Chinese, Indian and Fish and Chip meals from local towns _ over 7 miles away _ are used occasionally.
